channel.title: RuneFatality | Skills | Pking | 24/7 | Join now!
channel.description:
[COLOR=limegreen][center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/16118cw.png[/img]
[u][b]Info[/b][/u]
* [u][b][img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2bqfsp.png[/img]Server's Developers[img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2bqfsp.png[/img][/b][/u]
Faran (MrFaranCool) Matthew (Seventy Five) Oscar (SparkPkz)
[i]Please note that these are not all of the Server’s features, We mayhave forgotten some. Sorry if I have, there’s too many features to remember & list ;) [/i]
[b][u]The server’s features:[/u][/b]
- Perfect PvP, Perfect combat in general, PvN, NvP, Mage, Range & Prayer. All 100% with correct timers and formulas to give you the best PKing experience.
- Clean server (no shit added). I have spent hours removing unnecessary stuff from the server so it isn’t cluttered.
- Variety of places to train. We have dungeons & lots of areas filled with npcs that have drops to help you on your way on RuneFatality.
- Fully clipped Player & NPC follwing!!!
- Fully functional clan chat with working ranks. Players can join a CC, create their own Clan Chat, invite players to their CC & kick people from their own cc. To speak in Clan Chat use / MESSAGE HERE. (Just like RS)
- All skills working 90%+. when we say it, we mean it. We have spent hours perfecting skills with just the right XP rates.
- Economy. When it comes to a server, you don’t want to find everyone with rares and all party hats. We have made a PK Point shop so it’s a challenge to obtain good/rare items.There is a thieving stall at home where you gain 50k per click. It is behind near the big bank in Varrock.
- Added a very cool home with portals, npcs & shops. I have decided to add a unique home. All the servers around today have their home at Edgeville, here at RuneFatality, we decided to be different from the rest.
- High class networking system.
- A HUGE variety of mini-games including: Fight Pits, Barrows, Jad, Assault, Pest Control & Duel Arena with staking. All mini-games have the correct timers and interfaces. God Wars is currently being fixed.
[b][u]Client Features[/u][/b]
- 474, 525 and 562 game frame change, players can play what they like! This is a good feature for people that like new runescape.
-All special attacks work.
-ALL 474 data packed into the cache.
-Full Godwars maps.
-New NPCs and items.[/color]
Server media
[img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Worldmap.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Tzaar.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Theiving.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Teleports.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Slayer.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Skillcapes.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/RFD.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Prayers.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Portals.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/PestControl.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Home.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/GodWars.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Dueling.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Barrows.png[/img] [img]http://i1178.photobucket.com/albums/x380/MrFaranCool/Bank.png[/img]
[b]That’s it, we hope to see you online![/b][/center]

item.description:
@EruptionX wrote:

[COLOR=limegreen][center]

16118cw.png700×150

Info

Server’s Developers

Faran (MrFaranCool)
Matthew (Seventy Five)
Oscar (SparkPkz)

Please note that these are not all of the Server’s features, We mayhave forgotten some. Sorry if I have, there’s too many features to remember & list

The server’s features:

  • Perfect PvP, Perfect combat in general, PvN, NvP, Mage, Range & Prayer. All 100% with correct timers and formulas to give you the best PKing experience.

  • Clean server (no shit added). I have spent hours removing unnecessary stuff from the server so it isn’t cluttered.

  • Variety of places to train. We have dungeons & lots of areas filled with npcs that have drops to help you on your way on RuneFatality.

  • Fully clipped Player & NPC follwing!!!

  • Fully functional clan chat with working ranks. Players can join a CC, create their own Clan Chat, invite players to their CC & kick people from their own cc. To speak in Clan Chat use / MESSAGE HERE. (Just like RS)

  • All skills working 90%+. when we say it, we mean it. We have spent hours perfecting skills with just the right XP rates.

  • Economy. When it comes to a server, you don’t want to find everyone with rares and all party hats. We have made a PK Point shop so it’s a challenge to obtain good/rare items.There is a thieving stall at home where you gain 50k per click. It is behind near the big bank in Varrock.

  • Added a very cool home with portals, npcs & shops. I have decided to add a unique home. All the servers around today have their home at Edgeville, here at RuneFatality, we decided to be different from the rest.

  • High class networking system.

  • A HUGE variety of mini-games including: Fight Pits, Barrows, Jad, Assault, Pest Control & Duel Arena with staking. All mini-games have the correct timers and interfaces. God Wars is currently being fixed.

Client Features

  • 474, 525 and 562 game frame change, players can play what they like! This is a good feature for people that like new runescape.

-All special attacks work.

-ALL 474 data packed into the cache.

-Full Godwars maps.

-New NPCs and items.[/color]
